seo.title: Muhammed Alsayed - Projects
seo.description: Explore the diverse portfolio of Muhammed Alsayed, a front-end web developer. View my featured projects built with various technologies like Vue, Nuxt, TailwindCSS, and more.

projects.title: Building Interfaces, Bringing Ideas to Life.
projects.description: I've worked on a variety of projects, from simple websites to complex web applications. Here are a few of my favorites.

items.title: Libya Roots
items.description: Libya Roots is a tourism platform built to showcase Libyaâ€™s cultural and historical landmarks through an interactive and responsive web experience. Developed as part of the NovaMinds team, I was responsible for developing the web application, enabling users to explore categorized destinations, view locations on maps, and save favorites for trip planning. This project was created for the university as part of the 'Project Management'(ITGS303).

items.title: Zad Al-muslim
items.description: Zad Al-Muslim is an Islamic resource platform offering Quran recitations, Islamic radio stations, and educational lessons. It provides easy access to spiritual resources, enhancing religious knowledge and practice with a user-friendly interface.

items.title: Easy Bank
items.description: Easy Bank is a landing page website It was built by vanilla js and tailwindcss I built this website to test my skills on tailwind.

items.title: Movie App
items.description: Movie Clone is a web application built with Vue. It was my first Vue project, created to practice Vue fundamentals, data fetching, and routing. I used Vue Router for navigation and Pinia for state management. While it's a bit rough around the edges, it served as a great learning experience.
